quiz.question: ________ proposal
quiz.explanation: 提议, 求婚. He made a romantic marriage proposal at sunset. 他在日落时做出了浪漫的求婚。

quiz.question: _____ rehearsal
quiz.explanation: 排练, 彩排. The actors attended the final dress rehearsal. 演员们参加了最后的彩排。

quiz.question: dorsal ___
quiz.explanation: 背部的, 背鳍. The shark's dorsal fin cut through the water. 鲨鱼的背鳍划破水面。

quiz.question: colossal ______
quiz.explanation: 巨大的, 巨大的雕像. The ancient city featured a colossal statue of a god. 古城有一座神的巨大雕像。

quiz.question: causal ____
quiz.explanation: 因果的, 因果联系. Researchers established a causal link between variables. 研究人员建立了变量之间的因果联系。

quiz.question: espousal __ _____
quiz.explanation: 支持, 支持事业. Her espousal of cause brought many followers. 她对事业的支持带来了许多追随者。

quiz.question: natal _____
quiz.explanation: 出生的, 出生图. Astrologers study a person's natal chart. 占星家研究一个人的出生图。

quiz.question: ____ petal
quiz.explanation: 花瓣, 玫瑰花瓣. A delicate rose petal fell to the ground. 一片娇嫩的玫瑰花瓣落到地上。

quiz.question: centripetal _____
quiz.explanation: 向心的, 向心力. Centripetal force keeps planets in orbit. 向心力使行星保持在轨道上。

quiz.question: congenital ______
quiz.explanation: 先天的, 先天缺陷. The baby was born with a congenital defect. 婴儿出生时有先天缺陷。

quiz.question: marital ______
quiz.explanation: 婚姻的, 婚姻状况. The form asked for marital status. 表格询问婚姻状况。

quiz.question: vital _____
quiz.explanation: 生命的, 生命体征. Nurses regularly check patients' vital signs. 护士定期检查患者的生命体征。

quiz.question: Occidental _______
quiz.explanation: 西方的, 西方文化. The scholar studied Occidental culture extensively. 学者广泛研究了西方文化。

quiz.question: transcendental __________
quiz.explanation: 超验的, 超验哲学. Kant developed transcendental philosophy. 康德发展了超验哲学。

quiz.question: fundamental _________
quiz.explanation: 基本的, 基本原则. Democracy rests on fundamental principle of equality. 民主建立在平等的基本原则上。

quiz.question: detrimental ______
quiz.explanation: 有害的, 有害影响. Smoking has a detrimental effect on health. 吸烟对健康有有害影响。

quiz.question: monumental ______
quiz.explanation: 巨大的, 巨大的努力. The project required monumental effort from the team. 该项目需要团队付出巨大的努力。

quiz.question: instrumental ____
quiz.explanation: 重要的, 重要作用. She played an instrumental role in the success. 她在成功中发挥了重要作用。

quiz.question: teetotal _________
quiz.explanation: 绝对戒酒的, 绝对戒酒的生活方式. He adopted a teetotal lifestyle for health reasons. 他出于健康原因采用了绝对戒酒的生活方式。

quiz.question: immortal ____
quiz.explanation: 不朽的, 不朽的灵魂. Many religions believe in the immortal soul. 许多宗教相信不朽的灵魂。

quiz.question: _____ pedestal
quiz.explanation: 底座, 石底座. The statue stood on a stone pedestal. 雕像矗立在石底座上。

quiz.question: festal ________
quiz.explanation: 节日的, 节日场合. The community gathered for the festal occasion. 社区为节日场合聚集在一起。

quiz.question: distal ____
quiz.explanation: 远端的, 远端肢体. The injury affected the distal limb. 伤害影响了远端肢体。

quiz.question: ____ acquittal
quiz.explanation: 无罪判决, 完全无罪判决. The defendant received full acquittal on all charges. 被告在所有指控上获得完全无罪判决。

quiz.question: ______ rebuttal
quiz.explanation: 反驳, 强有力的反驳. The lawyer delivered a strong rebuttal to accusations. 律师对指控进行了强有力的反驳。

quiz.question: dual ___________
quiz.explanation: 双重的, 双重国籍. She holds dual citizenship in two countries. 她持有两个国家的双重国籍。

quiz.question: residual ______
quiz.explanation: 剩余的, 剩余收入. Actors earn residual income from reruns. 演员从重播中赚取剩余收入。

quiz.question: lingual _____
quiz.explanation: 舌的, 舌神经. The dentist was careful not to damage the lingual nerve. 牙医小心不损伤舌神经。

quiz.question: bilingual _________
quiz.explanation: 双语的, 双语教育. The school offers bilingual education programs. 学校提供双语教育项目。

quiz.question: sensual ________
quiz.explanation: 感官的, 感官享受. The spa promised sensual pleasure and relaxation. 水疗中心承诺感官享受和放松。

quiz.question: factual ________
quiz.explanation: 事实的, 事实证据. The report was based on factual evidence. 报告基于事实证据。

quiz.question: ineffectual ______
quiz.explanation: 无效的, 无效的努力. Their ineffectual effort failed to solve the problem. 他们无效的努力未能解决问题。

quiz.question: ______ intellectual
quiz.explanation: 知识分子, 公共知识分子. The public intellectual wrote influential essays. 这位公共知识分子写了有影响力的文章。

quiz.question: perpetual ______
quiz.explanation: 永久的, 永动. Scientists proved perpetual motion is impossible. 科学家证明永动是不可能的。

quiz.question: _______ ritual
quiz.explanation: 仪式, 古老的仪式. The tribe performed an ancient ritual. 部落进行了古老的仪式。

quiz.question: spiritual ______
quiz.explanation: 精神的, 精神成长. Meditation promotes spiritual growth. 冥想促进精神成长。

quiz.question: _______ upheaval
quiz.explanation: 剧变, 暴力剧变. The revolution caused violent upheaval in society. 革命在社会中引起了暴力剧变。

quiz.question: medieval ______
quiz.explanation: 中世纪的, 中世纪城堡. Tourists visited the medieval castle. 游客参观了中世纪城堡。

quiz.question: coeval _______
quiz.explanation: 同时代的, 同时代的朋友. The two artists were coeval friends. 这两位艺术家是同时代的朋友。

quiz.question: ________ rival
quiz.explanation: 竞争对手, 商业竞争对手. The companies have been business rival for years. 这些公司多年来一直是商业竞争对手。

quiz.question: ______ avowal
quiz.explanation: 公开承认, 公开承认. His public avowal surprised everyone. 他的公开承认让每个人都感到惊讶。

quiz.question: decibel _____
quiz.explanation: 分贝, 分贝水平. The concert exceeded safe decibel level. 音乐会超过了安全分贝水平。

quiz.question: ______ libel
quiz.explanation: 诽谤, 犯诽谤罪. The newspaper was sued for publishing statements that commit libel. 该报纸因发表犯诽谤罪的声明而被起诉。

quiz.question: excel __ ____
quiz.explanation: 擅长, 擅长数学. She naturally excel at math and science. 她天生擅长数学和科学。

quiz.question: peel __ ______
quiz.explanation: 剥皮, 剥橙子皮. He used a knife to peel an orange. 他用刀剥橙子皮。

quiz.question: reel ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 蹒跚, 因震惊而蹒跚. She continued to reel from shock of the news. 她继续因消息的震惊而蹒跚。

quiz.question: genteel _______
quiz.explanation: 有教养的, 有教养的举止. The lady displayed genteel manners. 这位女士表现出有教养的举止。

quiz.question: _______ yokel
quiz.explanation: 乡巴佬, 乡下人. The sophisticated urbanite mocked the country yokel. 老练的城里人嘲笑乡下人。

quiz.question: parallel _____
quiz.explanation: 平行的, 平行线. Parallel lines never intersect. 平行线永不相交。

quiz.question: enamel _______
quiz.explanation: 珐琅, 珐琅涂层. The bathtub had a white enamel coating. 浴缸有白色珐琅涂层。

quiz.question: _____ trammel
quiz.explanation: 束缚, 法律束缚. The regulation acted as a legal trammel on freedom. 该法规作为对自由的法律束缚。

quiz.question: ___ kennel
quiz.explanation: 狗舍, 狗舍. The family left their pet at the dog kennel. 家人把宠物留在狗舍。

quiz.question: _______ personnel
quiz.explanation: 人员, 公司人员. The company personnel attended the training. 公司人员参加了培训。

quiz.question: _____ chapel
quiz.explanation: 小教堂, 小教堂. They were married in a small chapel. 他们在一个小教堂结婚。

quiz.question: impel ______
quiz.explanation: 推动, 推动行动. Moral duty should impel action. 道德责任应该推动行动。

quiz.question: compel __________
quiz.explanation: 强迫, 强迫遵守. The law will compel compliance with regulations. 法律将强迫遵守法规。

quiz.question: _________ gospel
quiz.explanation: 福音, 基督教福音. The Christian gospel spread throughout the world. 基督教福音传播到世界各地。

quiz.question: expel _ _______
quiz.explanation: 驱逐, 开除学生. The school decided to expel a student for cheating. 学校决定因作弊开除一名学生。

quiz.question: ______ apparel
quiz.explanation: 服装, 休闲服装. The office allows casual apparel on Fridays. 办公室周五允许穿休闲服装。

quiz.question: doggerel _____
quiz.explanation: 打油诗, 打油诗. The comedian recited doggerel verse. 喜剧演员背诵打油诗。

quiz.question: mongrel ___
quiz.explanation: 杂种, 杂种狗. The mongrel dog was adopted from the shelter. 杂种狗从收容所被收养。

quiz.question: _____ ____ _ squirrel
quiz.explanation: 松鼠, 像松鼠一样囤积. He tends to hoard like a squirrel preparing for winter. 他倾向于像松鼠准备过冬一样囤积。

quiz.question: ____ wastrel
quiz.explanation: 浪费者, 游手好闲的浪费者. The idle wastrel squandered his inheritance. 游手好闲的浪费者挥霍了他的遗产。

quiz.question: ______'_ easel
quiz.explanation: 画架, 艺术家的画架. The painter set up the artist's easel outdoors. 画家在户外架起艺术家的画架。

quiz.question: _____ vessel
quiz.explanation: 船只, 货船. The cargo vessel transported goods across the ocean. 货船运送货物穿越海洋。

quiz.question: pastel _____
quiz.explanation: 淡色的, 淡色. The nursery was painted in soft pastel color. 育儿室用柔和的淡色粉刷。

quiz.question: ______ duel
quiz.explanation: 决斗, 手枪决斗. The gentlemen engaged in a pistol duel at dawn. 绅士们在黎明时进行了手枪决斗。

quiz.question: _____'_ gavel
quiz.explanation: 法槌, 法官的法槌. The judge's gavel struck the bench for order. 法官的法槌敲击长凳以维持秩序。

quiz.question: ravel ___
quiz.explanation: 解开, 解开. The sweater began to ravel out at the seams. 毛衣开始在接缝处解开。

quiz.question: gravel ________
quiz.explanation: 砾石, 砾石车道. The gravel driveway crunched under the car's tires. 砾石车道在汽车轮胎下嘎吱作响。

quiz.question: ____ drivel
quiz.explanation: 胡言乱语, 说胡言乱语. Don't talk drivel about things you don't understand. 不要胡言乱语你不懂的事情。

quiz.question: marvel __ ___________
quiz.explanation: 奇迹, 工程奇迹. The bridge is a marvel of engineering. 这座桥是工程奇迹。

quiz.question: ____ bail
quiz.explanation: 保释金, 缴纳保释金. The lawyer helped post bail for the defendant. 律师帮助为被告缴纳保释金。

quiz.question: hail _____
quiz.explanation: 冰雹, 冰雹风暴. The hail storm damaged crops in the fields. 冰雹风暴损坏了田里的庄稼。

quiz.question: ______ blackmail
quiz.explanation: 勒索, 进行勒索. The criminal attempted to commit blackmail. 罪犯试图进行勒索。

quiz.question: rail _______
quiz.explanation: 抱怨, 抱怨. He would rail against injustice in society. 他会抱怨社会的不公正。

quiz.question: assail ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 攻击, 攻击阵地. The army prepared to assail the position. 军队准备攻击阵地。

quiz.question: entail _____
quiz.explanation: 需要, 需要成本. The project will entail costs beyond the budget. 该项目将需要超出预算的成本。

quiz.question: curtail ________
quiz.explanation: 削减, 削减开支. The company had to curtail spending due to losses. 由于亏损,公司不得不削减开支。

quiz.question: prevail ____
quiz.explanation: 劝说, 劝说. She managed to prevail upon him to reconsider. 她设法劝说他重新考虑。

quiz.question: stencil _______
quiz.explanation: 模板, 模板图案. The artist used a stencil pattern for the design. 艺术家使用模板图案进行设计。

quiz.question: nonpareil _______
quiz.explanation: 无与伦比的, 无与伦比的质量. The product is of nonpareil quality. 该产品具有无与伦比的质量。

quiz.question: ______ veil
quiz.explanation: 面纱, 新娘面纱. The bride wore a beautiful bridal veil. 新娘戴着美丽的新娘面纱。

quiz.question: fulfil _ _______
quiz.explanation: 履行, 履行诺言. He always strives to fulfil a promise he makes. 他总是努力履行他做出的诺言。

quiz.question: ____ __ nil
quiz.explanation: 零, 化为零. Their efforts seemed to come to nil. 他们的努力似乎化为零。

quiz.question: foil ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 挫败, 挫败阴谋. The detective managed to foil the plot. 侦探设法挫败了阴谋。

quiz.question: spoil ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 破坏, 破坏乐趣. Don't spoil the fun with negative comments. 不要用消极评论破坏乐趣。

quiz.question: despoil ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 掠夺, 掠夺土地. Invaders would despoil the land of resources. 侵略者会掠夺土地资源。

quiz.question: roil ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 搅乱, 搅乱市场. The scandal continued to roil the market. 丑闻继续搅乱市场。

quiz.question: broil _____
quiz.explanation: 烤, 烤牛排. The chef will broil steak for dinner. 厨师将为晚餐烤牛排。

quiz.question: embroil __ _______
quiz.explanation: 卷入, 卷入丑闻. The politician became embroil in scandal. 这位政客卷入了丑闻。

quiz.question: imperil ______
quiz.explanation: 危及, 危及安全. Reckless driving will imperil safety on roads. 鲁莽驾驶会危及道路安全。

quiz.question: _______ utensil
quiz.explanation: 器具, 厨房器具. She stored kitchen utensil in drawers. 她把厨房器具存放在抽屉里。

quiz.question: cavil __ _______
quiz.explanation: 挑剔, 对细节挑剔. Critics cavil at details but miss the main point. 批评者对细节挑剔但错过了要点。

quiz.question: daredevil _____
quiz.explanation: 冒险者, 冒险特技. The actor performed a dangerous daredevil stunt. 演员表演了一个危险的冒险特技。

quiz.question: __________'_ anvil
quiz.explanation: 铁砧, 铁匠的铁砧. The blacksmith's anvil rang with each hammer blow. 铁匠的铁砧随着每次锤击而响起。

quiz.question: blackball _ _________
quiz.explanation: 投票反对, 投票反对候选人. Club members voted to blackball a candidate. 俱乐部成员投票反对一位候选人。

quiz.question: ______ pitfall
quiz.explanation: 陷阱, 隐藏的陷阱. Investors must avoid hidden pitfall in contracts. 投资者必须避免合同中隐藏的陷阱。

quiz.question: ____ _ pall
quiz.explanation: 笼罩, 投下阴影. The tragedy would cast a pall over celebrations. 悲剧会给庆祝活动投下阴影。

quiz.question: __ thrall __
quiz.explanation: 奴役, 受奴役于. He lived in thrall to his addiction. 他受奴役于他的成瘾。
